TextLibrary.Text: The attunement went as planned but. . .
The attunement went as planned but, I have some bad news.
An agent was sent here and met with me. She told me Nasty Butler was imprisoned for shady dealings with the rest of the MRI and all his assets were liquidated.
An agent was sent here and met with me. She told me Nasty Butler was imprisoned for shady dealings with the rest of the MRI and all his assets were liquidated.
Oh great, and the weapon research?
Oh great, and the weapon research?

Sold out to the highest bidders, I'm afraid. But, since we're the only ones able to use these weapons, it should only be a matter of tracking them down. For starters, a weapon dealer on Talosian Station has the smallest of the devices.

Sold out to the highest bidders, I'm afraid. But, since we're the only ones able to use these weapons, it should only be a matter of tracking them down. For starters, a weapon dealer on Talosian Station has the smallest of the devices.
Well, let's get started. We go to the Talosian station.
Well, let's get started. We go to the Talosian station.
